name: library-management-system-mern-stack
description: - I'm building a Library Management System using MERN Stack. - Currently, I'm working on its backend with `Node.js`, `Express.js`and `MongoDB`. - This Repo is Open for Collaborations and Contributions. - If you know react, you can contribute in building the frontend.
author: Subham Sahoo (https://github.com/realsubhamsahoo)
